ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Skills questions
ygData.msgSnippet: From what I have read, and what I have experienced, FD goes up really slow, I mean CRAWLING slow.  I put one point in it at 18th (starting me at 18)and have
ygData.messageBody:
From what I have read, and what I have experienced, FD goes up really slow,
I mean CRAWLING slow. I put one point in it at 18th (starting me at 18)and
have been hitting it almost constantly, running, waiting, I mean anytime I
remember to hit the thing, and I think it just hit 35. I hear once it hits
50, it goes up a bit faster. If you want to see it work, stand in front of
a green mob that wont agro on you, and preferably won't move. and hit ONLY
the ID key, and just keep hitting it over and over and eventually it will go
off on it. At such a low level, this skill is not going to benifit you in
combat in anyway, for a good while. Ahh well I know people who have gotten
it to the low 100s but I don't often hear that it is a great help. Probably
just as much of a help as a Spell Thrower's fear spell.

Sister Shelza

>From: Caza Gaming <MeCaza@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Skills questions
>Date: Thu, 16 Mar 2000 16:49:52 -0800 (PST)
>
>My FD works great.. has saved my butt HEAPS.. just
>keep practicing like crazy...
>
>Instill doubt.. well, I try to practice and practice..
>don't see it working.. don't see it improving either
>*shrugs hopelessly* but then I said that with Safe
>Fall at early levels too :-)) Now THAT is maxxed
>within 5 mins of gaining a new level :-)
>
>Sneak is very sneaky.. hehe... AND if you find a
>vendor that don't like you, just use sneak and he/she
>immediately becomes indifferent... hooray!!
>
>I love my Monk, have Mend and Bind Wound over 100 and
>hardly ever have to sit down! Drives my partner
>crazy.. :-))
>
>Merilyn, Sister of the Ashen Order on Xegony
>
>Hope this helps.. can someone help ME with ID???
>
